Name: El Viajero
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dust side of glass with coconut dust and garnish with lime zest twist.
Review: Rum, coconut water and Pedro Ximénez sherry are unusual bedfellows in a cocktail but work well together and are toned by lime juice and chocolate bitters.
History: Originally based on Bacardi Carta Blanca rum, this was the Hungarian Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail , created by Norbert Schök at the Four Seasons Gresham Palace in Kollázs, Budapest.
Nutrition: One serving of El Viajero contains 123 calories
